params.name: data

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The metric descriptor on which to execute the request. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/metricDescriptors/[METRIC_ID] An example value of [METRIC_ID] is "compute.googleapis.com/instance/disk/read_bytes_count".
